ch0031_40_fuu/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waiting
for you to come!
ch0031_40_fuu/0101_0701_02_10:
I can see a future where we enjoy the star
festival together!
ch0031_40_fuu/7101_0701_01_10:
When you look up at the night sky, it’s full of stars,
and it carries on forever... Really makes you think
about how wide space is.
ch0031_40_fuu/7101_0701_02_10:
I wonder if people or Pokémon live somewhere on
those stars!
ch0031_40_fuu/7101_0701_03_10:
It would be great if we could adventure in space
freely one day!
ch0031_40_fuu/7102_0701_01_10:
Apparently the star festival is where you wish
upon a star and have fun with everyone.
ch0031_40_fuu/7102_0701_02_10:
I wonder why they started to host festivals to wish
on stars.
ch0031_40_fuu/7102_0701_03_10:
Maybe people a long time ago met Jirachi and
came up with the idea!
ch0031_40_fuu/7103_0701_01_10: They say Jirachi can make any wish come true!
ch0031_40_fuu/7103_0701_02_10:
I can imagine that if I wished to win a Pokémon
battle, Jirachi could make it come true, but...
ch0031_40_fuu/7103_0701_03_10:
with Jirachi, I can win any battle without making
a wish!
ch0031_40_fuu/7104_0701_02_10: We’re both shiny, just like the stars!
ch0031_40_fuu/7104_0701_03_10: It’s the perfect outfit to enjoy the star festival!
ch0031_40_fuu/7105_0701_01_10:
I wanna be friends with you forever,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0031_40_fuu/7105_0701_02_10:
That’s my wish, but I don’t want to rely on
Jirachi’s power.
ch0031_40_fuu/7105_0701_03_10: I hope I can make my wish come true on my own!
ch0031_40_fuu/1701_0701_01_10: This is a gift for you! Please take it!
ch0031_40_fuu/1701_0702_01_10: I hope this is something you’ve been wishing for!
ch0031_40_fuu/2501_0701_01_10:
If you do have a wish, you should decide it before
Jirachi goes back to sleep!
ch0031_40_fuu/2501_0701_02_10: Huh? Do I know when Jirachi will wake up next?
ch0031_40_fuu/2501_0701_03_10:
Whaaa?! A th-thousand years? It’s going to sleep
for that long?!
ch0031_40_fuu/2501_0702_01_10:
If I slept for a thousand years, I think I could stay
awake for a thousand years, too...
ch0031_40_fuu/2501_0702_02_10:
and I guess I wouldn’t get in trouble for staying
up late?
ch0031_40_fuu/2511_0701_01_10:
Stars are constantly moving, and apparently there
are these two stars that meet only once per year.
ch0031_40_fuu/2511_0701_02_10: That must be lonely for them...
ch0031_40_fuu/2511_0701_03_10:
It made me realize how special it is that I can see
you or Liza whenever I want!
ch0031_40_fuu/2511_0702_01_10:
Even if you or Liza were to go somewhere
far away...
ch0031_40_fuu/2511_0702_02_10: I promise I’ll follow and see you again!
ch0031_40_fuu/3001_0701_01_10:
I woke up early today, just in case there’s a
festival! Let’s have lots of fun together!
ch0031_40_fuu/3003_0701_01_10:
I hope the sky stays clear, even through the night!
I don’t want the stars to hide behind the clouds.
ch0031_40_fuu/3005_0701_01_10:
Let’s go stargazing tonight! If I fall asleep, promise
you’ll wake me up?
